title: News24.com | WATCH | WHO says 'reviewing the impact' of US funding halt
description: The World Health Organization says it was reviewing what impact the US decision to halt funding would have, and said it was looking to others to help fill financial "gaps".
content:
The World Health Organization said on Wednesday it was reviewing what impact the US decision to halt funding would have, and said it was looking to others to help fill financial "gaps".
"WHO is reviewing the impact on our work of any withdrawal of US funding… [+653 chars]
